argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumsubm.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 2 |  | gsumsubm.s | |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) |
| 3 |  | gsumsubm.f | |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) |
| 4 |  | gsumsubm.h | |- H = ( G |`s S ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` G ) = ( +g ` G ) |
| 7 |  | #P_submrcl | |- ( S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 8 | 2, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 9 | 5 | #P_submss | |- ( S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) -> S C_ ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> S C_ ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_subm0cl | |- ( S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) -> ( 0g ` G ) e. S ) |
| 13 | 2, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( 0g ` G ) e. S ) |
| 14 | 5, 6, 11 | #P_mndlrid | |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ x e. ( Base ` G ) ) -> ( ( ( 0g ` G ) ( +g ` G ) x ) = x /\ ( x ( +g ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) = x ) ) |
| 15 | 8, 14 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( Base ` G ) ) -> ( ( ( 0g ` G ) ( +g ` G ) x ) = x /\ ( x ( +g ` G ) ( 0g ` G ) ) = x ) ) |
| 16 | 5, 6, 4, 8, 1, 10, 3, 13, 15 | #P_gsumress | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( H gsum F ) ) |
